SHOMER SHABBOS

RESORTS WORLD - CONRAD | 5-STAR LUXURY

PRICING

Imagine a 5-star Shabbaton resort on the Las Vegas strip with a sign shaped like a Shabbos candle with kosher food and all the luxury amenities you expect from a 5-star Vegas resort and featuring Jewish leaders, speakers, rabbaim, musical artists, comedians, magicians, etc. We interviewed 55 of the most famous resorts in Las Vegas but only RESORTS WORLD was logistically capable. Resorts World allowed us to change automatic plumbing fixtures in public bathrooms on the ballroom floor to accommodate Shabbos observance. Our long-term relationship even provides Shabbos elevators and a full-time kosher kitchen.

RESORTS WORLD is Las Vegasâ€™ newest, largest and most expensive resort ever built in Las Vegas at $4.3B. It is a true 5-star luxury resort.

ONE OF THE HEALTHIEST, MOST NUTRITIOUS PESACH PROGRAMS EVER PRODUCED

â€œin hight or the increasing rates or cancer, disease and questionable feed / nutrients in produce, meat and dairy, / feel personally responsible to provide only healthy, nutritious and, sad to have to say, non-toxic food to our guests at Pesach and beyond. Therefore, in light of our Mission to bring Jews together, and our commitment to treat Jews as family, | am only going to feed Jews what | would feed my family. Our pro- gram will be the only all organic, non-GMQ, program in the world. Fur- thermore, each day will have a juice and smoothie bar for guests – adults and children.â€ – Aryeh Rifkin, President
